@description.name: @description
@description.body: Simple JavaScript tokenizer used to print syntax highlighted JavaScript code. Based on Public Domain code by Christopher Diggins http://www.cdiggins.com/tokenizer.html

@param.name: @param
@param.body: javaScriptText {String} String of JavaScript code to tokenize
@param.description: String of JavaScript code to tokenize

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map[]} Array of tokens. A token is a map with the fields type containing the token type and value, which contains the string value of the token from the input string.
@return.description: Array of tokens. A token is a map with the fields type containing the token type and value, which contains the string value of the token from the input string.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Create a colored HTML string for a string of JavaScript code. The colored elements are placed in span elements with class names corresponding to the token types. The returned code should be placed into pre tags to preserve the indentation.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: javaScriptText {String} String of JavaScript code to tokenize
@param.description: String of JavaScript code to tokenize

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
forPreTag {Boolean ? false} Whatever the HTML should be generated
   for a pre tag or not
@param.description:
Whatever the HTML should be generated
   for a pre tag or not

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} HTML fragment with the colored JavaScript code.
@return.description: HTML fragment with the colored JavaScript code.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxObjectId. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
